name: Beach Volley Pro
description:
** BEST BEACH VOLLEY OF THE STORE **
** 2,9M DOWNLOADS THANKS!!! **

After the great success of beach volleyball OverTheNet (our "vintage" game inspired by the glorious Amiga version), Dardari Multimedia launches new totally renovated "Beach Volley Pro".
Enjoy the most beautiful beaches in the world in exciting tournaments against increasingly aggressive opponents, or multiplayer against your friends.
The different modes of control of the player will meet all your needs, from player "arcade" than "professional." There is of course the classic system of control with the spike made using the "swipe" on the screen: a faster "swipe" = more powerful shoot!

- 18 teams (male and female) with different characteristics
- 17 different beaches
- tutorial
- practice
- Mode "Championship", an exciting tournament in the beaches around the world
- difficult level increases with the progress of the tournament
- "arcade" and "professional" mode, with the possibility to choose whether to move the player automatically
- variable opponents AI
- 3D and HD graphics
- Multiplayer Bluetooth and GameCenter, reccomended!
- Game Center leaderboards and achievements

- The game is "universal", compatible with iPhone (from 5) and iPad
- Supports retina display
- iOS from 8.0

*** If you have any problem or suggestion, please contact us! The game is constantly being updated ***

c) 2013-16 by Dardari Multimedia (Dardari Bros)
